title: Trump Used Blank Sheets of Paper as Conflict-of-Interest Documents?
subtitle: Reporters weren't allowed to examine stacks of files presented at a press conference by Donald Trump as evidence he was turning his businesses over to his sons.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Stacks of file folders presented as evidence that President-elect Donald Trump was turning his business holdings over to his children were empty and/or contained blank sheets of paper.
